author: Craig Barbieri
comment: This is a really handy app. I have used my watch as a flashlight for a while now. But now being able to stay "open flashlight"  is so much easier. I only wish that this had a way of automatically overriding with brightness to brightest or even having a brightness toggle or slider. Thanks for the cool app.
title: Handy, needs brightness override

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Could not talk you into modifying the icon so I can see it on a black background?
title: Icon is black

author: Jason Allen
comment: Voice trigger updated, awesome ☺ Just what I was looking for, does the job perfectly and with minimal fuss.

reply.author: Brain Wave Apps
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback I just pushed an update that should be available in the play store very shortly that allows you to just say "open flashlight". Thank you for alerting me to this issue and i hope you enjoy using this app!

title: Perfect!

author: Greg Widener
comment: Just what I was looking for.
title: Simple and perfect.

author: Phill Danks
comment: It would get 5 stars if it turned up the device's brightness as well. (And turned it back to the previous setting on exit). Without this you may as well just go to the launch menu with a tap and swipe.
title: Straightforward and it works, but...

author: Rick Cousins
comment: Activating by voice often leads to Google hearing Where not Wear as other developers have noted.

reply.author: Brain Wave Apps
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback I just pushed an update that should be available in the play store very shortly that allows you to just say "open flashlight". Thank you for alerting me to this issue and i hope you enjoy using this app!

title: Google has trouble parsing wear as a, command
